mapper.select: SELECT C.feed_comment_id AS feedCommentId, C.comment, C.user_id AS writerUserId, if(U.nick_name IS NULL, U.uid, U.nick_name) AS writerNm, U.pic AS writerPic FROM feed_comments C JOIN user U ON U.user_id=C.user_id WHERE feed_id=#{feedId} ORDER BY feed_comment_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
